title: RAF
body: I've refered five friends and they all are playing the game but im not getting any points.. Anyone know why?

replies.body:
Rewards are self redeeming. 

Go here and log in, and you can see what level your referrals are at and them redeem.

http://rewards.na.leagueoflegends.com/

For the rewards, they have to reach level 10 on the account.
Hope this helps.
